listitem.para: Download and install the Ubuntu security updates.
Next we need to generate the SSH public/private keys for the server.
Be sure to just hit return for the passphrase prompt (we do NOT want a passphrase). Otherwise we cannot get true automation from our scripts.
Copy the host's public key into our authorized keys file.
Now copy our public key to the host.
Now on the host (NOT the VMware guest!) copy that key to the authorized keys file.
